verses.verse: Observe <S%H8104><s%> the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib <S%H24><s%>, and keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: for in the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib <S%H24><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>.

You shall therefore sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, of the flock <S%H6629><s%> and the herd <S%H1241><s%>, in the place <S%H4725><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> his name there <S%H8034><s%>.

You shall eat <S%H398><s%> no leavened bread <S%H2557><s%> with it <S%H7651><s%>; seven days <S%H3117><s%> shall you eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> with it <S%H3899><s%>, even the bread of affliction <S%H6040><s%>; for you came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in hurry <S%H2649><s%>: that you may remember <S%H2142><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> when you came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life <S%H2416><s%>.

And there shall be no leavened bread <S%H7603><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> with you in all your coast <S%H1366><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; neither shall there any thing of the flesh <S%H1320><s%>, which you sacrificedst <S%H2076><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>, remain <S%H3885><s%> all night until the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

You may <S%H3201><s%> not sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> inside any <S%H259><s%> of your gates <S%H8179><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives you <S%H5414><s%>:

But at the place <S%H4725><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in <S%H2076><s%>, there you shall sacrifice the passover <S%H6453><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>, at the going down <S%H935><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%>, at the season <S%H4150><s%> that you came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And you shall roast <S%H1310><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> it in the place <S%H4725><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>: and you shall turn <S%H6437><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and go <S%H1980><s%> unto your tents <S%H168><s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>: and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a solemn assembly <S%H6116><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no work in it <S%H4399><s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> shall you number <S%H5608><s%> unto you <S%H2490><s%>: begin to number <S%H5608><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> from such time as you beginnest <S%H2490><s%> to put the sickle <S%H2770><s%> to the corn <S%H7054><s%>.

And you shall keep <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks <S%H7620><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with a tribute <S%H4530><s%> of a freewill offering <S%H5071><s%> of your hand <S%H3027><s%>, which you shall give <S%H5414><s%> unto the Lord your God <S%H3068><s%>, according as the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> has blessed you <S%H1288><s%>:

And you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, you <S%H1121><s%>, and your son, and your daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and your manservant <S%H5650><s%>, and your maidservant <S%H519><s%>, and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> that is inside your gates <S%H8179><s%>, and the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, and the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and the widow <S%H490><s%>, that are among <S%H7130><s%> you <S%H4725><s%>, in the place which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> his name there <S%H8034><s%>.
And you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> that you were a bondman <S%H5650><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and you shall observe <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> these statutes <S%H2706><s%>.

You shall observe <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, after that you have gathered <S%H622><s%> in your corn <S%H1637><s%> and your wine <S%H3342><s%>:

And you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in your feast <S%H2282><s%>, you <S%H1121><s%>, and your son, and your daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and your manservant <S%H5650><s%>, and your maidservant <S%H519><s%>, and the Levite <S%H3881><s%>, the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, and the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and the widow <S%H490><s%>, that are inside your gates <S%H8179><s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall you keep a solemn feast <S%H2287><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>: because the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> you in all your increase <S%H8393><s%>, and in all the works <S%H4639><s%> of your hands <S%H3027><s%>, therefore you shall surely rejoice <S%H8056><s%>.

Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> in a year <S%H8141><s%> shall all your males <S%H2138><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which he shall choose <S%H977><s%>; in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>, and in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks <S%H7620><s%>, and in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%>: and they shall not appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> empty <S%H7387><s%>:
Every man <S%H376><s%> shall give as he is able <S%H4979><s%>, according to the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> which he has given you <S%H5414><s%>.

Judges <S%H8199><s%> and officers <S%H7860><s%> shall you make <S%H5414><s%> you in all your gates <S%H8179><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H7626><s%>, throughout your tribes: and they shall judge <S%H8199><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with just <S%H6664><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>.

You shall not bend <S%H5186><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>; you shall not respect <S%H5234><s%> persons <S%H6440><s%>, neither take <S%H3947><s%> a gift <S%H7810><s%>: for a gift <S%H7810><s%> does blind <S%H5786><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%>, and pervert <S%H5557><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.

That which is altogether <S%H6664><s%> just <S%H6664><s%> shall you follow <S%H7291><s%>, that you may live <S%H2421><s%>, and inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives you <S%H5414><s%>.

You shall not plant <S%H5193><s%> you a grove <S%H842><s%> of any trees <S%H6086><s%> near unto <S%H681><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, which you shall make you <S%H6213><s%>.
Neither shall you set you up <S%H6965><s%> any image <S%H4676><s%>; which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hates <S%H8130><s%>.
